Experimenting

Writing short pieces of code to experiment with what happens is easy and free and can be a terrific way to learn about Java and the libraries. Often questions come up such as:

  • What happens when you divide an int by 0?
  • What happens when you call charAt(11) on a String with 10 characters?
  • What happens if I try to print an instance of an Atom like I would a String?
  • How many characters does substring(2, 2) return?
  • Can I assign a new value to the number 5?
In many cases like this, the best answer is: Try it!
